name: Freaky Blocks
description:
Freak Blocks

Plattform:Android
engine : unity 3d
Developer :Taptastic

Releasse :2015

This is a better than match-3, addicitve new highscore puzzler

Blocks of some colors large clusters.
Larger clusters will give of you more points.
Global Highscore Board
This strategy puzzler requires more skill than any match3,
but is as easy to learn
Simple controls
Super addictive
Great game for anyone
Amazing soundtrack by VHS Glitch

http://www.freakyblocks.taptastic-games.com/
